ai-tika-s0401t4:1_1: In the fourth tetrad: the development of consciousness, the mind, not the one whose mind is fact that authorized .
ai-tika-s0401t4:1_3: The meaning is should be understood in the same way as the third case,
ai-tika-s0401t4:1_4: In the first of the fivefold reckoning: in the first direction the third direction the fourth direction.
ai-tika-s0401t4:2_1: But the meaning here should be understood according to the suttas beginning with the firstly in the seven classes of rebirths, etc., just as in the case of the synonyms, etc., according as it is said: “Here, not share in the thirty-two parts,” and “posites.
ai-tika-s0401t4:3_1: And one who from nine streams is called inferior in the fourfold section, which is more than nine orifices by pair of 80 kilometers,
ai-tika-s0401t4:4_0: The commentary on thety-three is finished.
